features.title: QR templates
features.desc: You get 13 built-in QR code templates to get you started right away.

features.title: Privacy
features.desc: We do not store any data of your created QR codes, except the ones that you save in your account willingly.

features.title: Highly customizable
features.desc: Create the QR code you need, brand it with your own colors & logo.

features.title: Tracking pixels
features.desc: Facebook, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Twitter, Quora tracking pixels available.

features.title: Projects
features.desc: Easiest way to categorize your managed resources.

features.title: Custom domains
features.desc: Connect your own domain or use our predefined ones.

types.title: Text
types.desc: Generate easy & customizable Text QR codes in minutes.

types.desc: Generate easy & customizable Text QR codes in minutes.
